$AAPL https://iphone.appleinsider.com/articles/18/05/28/siri-used-to-summon-medical-assistance-after-serious-motorcycle-crash

links.title: Siri used to summon medical assistance after serious motorcycle crash
links.description: 17-year-old used Siri to make an emergency call after a motorcycle crash. After numerous reports in recent months of lives being saved all over the world due to the Apple Watch noticing users' serious medical conditions, it now appears another piece of Apple technology has come in handy for someone in a bad spot.

messages.body: $AAPL https://iphone.appleinsider.com/articles/18/05/28/apple-watchs-heart-rate-sensors-alert-man-to-atrial-fibrillation

links.title: Apple Watch's heart rate sensors alert man to undiagnosed atrial fibrillation
links.description: An Apple Watch owner in England was recently rescued by a watchOS alert that his heart rate had suddenly spiked, even though he otherwise felt fine. Kevin Pearson was already at a hospital accompanying his father to an appointment, when his Watch warned him that his heart had surged to 161 beats per minute, The Independent said on Monday.

message.body: Apple Stock, FANGs Facebook, Amazon, Netflix, Google Are In Or Near Buy Zones http://dlvr.it/QVKbTM

links.title: Apple Stock, FANGs Facebook, Amazon, Netflix, Google Are At, Near Buys
links.description: With the Nasdaq composite, S&P 500 index and Dow Jones industrial average seemingly rangebound, Apple stock leads five top tech companies that are trading at or near buy points. FANG stocks Facebook ( FB), Amazon ( AMZN), Netflix ( NFLX) and Google parent Alphabet ( GOOGL) join the list along with Apple ( AAPL).

messages.body:
$AAPL Is Apple Leaving Billions on the Table?

https://www.investopedia.com/news/apple-leaving-billions-table/

links.title: Is Apple Leaving Billions on the Table?
links.description: Apple Inc. ( AAPL) is trying to grow the non-iPhone services portion of its business but it could be leaving potentially billions of dollars on the table in terms of subscription revenue. That's according to Gene Munster, the longtime Apple analyst who now runs Loup Ventures.

messages.body: Gene Munster: Service At The Core Of Apple https://benzinga.com/z/11751321 $AAPL

links.title: Gene Munster: Service At The Core Of Apple (NASDAQ:AAPL)
links.description: Apple Inc. (NASDAQ: AAPL) analysts are moving toward a sure consensus: growth is in the Services. The lessened emphasis on hardware has yielded new investment approaches. "We believe the Apple story is well positioned for future appreciation based on a longer-term, more sustainable investing paradigm," Loup Analyst Gene Munster recently wrote in the first installment of a four-note series.

messages.body: https://www.stockinvestor.com/?p=35519Summertime Seasonality About to Kick in $MSFT $MU $NVDA $FB $AAPL

links.title: Summertime Seasonality About to Kick in
links.description: The week leading up to the extended Memorial Day holiday weekend is typically an upbeat one for stocks. More confusion about the deal or no-deal situation with China and the possible delay of the North Korean summit affected stocks last Wednesday, but buyers stepped in on the sharply lower opening to support the market.
